credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: The Wiz
description: Tan poster with central image in black of a woman in profile, walking to the left, with abstract swirls (in black, violet, blue and green) radiating off her head and back, reminiscent of smoke. What appears to be the train of a dress takes the form of stairs or waves underneath these swirls. Below this image, text: "THE WIZ" in large black letters, followed by subtext, also in black.
name: Poster
